summary: REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 appear implemented via a new AuthGate flow: initialization screen, dedicated login screen, post-login permission verification with an AccessDenied screen (principal ID + copy + logout), and profile setup shown only when authorized + missing profile, with improved unauthorized vs generic error messaging on profile save. Some unrelated UI/behavior changes also appear (e.g., ActivityLogForm and AccusedInformationPage changes) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed ActivityLogForm behavior/UX (validation, toasts, dialog layout, pending state text) unrelated to Internet Identity login/authorization gate requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on auth/login gate, access denied screen, and profile onboarding; ActivityLogForm changes are outside scope.

hallucinated_features.description: AccusedInformationPage behavior changes (auto-triggered search on filter change, filter state management) unrelated to auth/login/authorization requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 and not required to implement the login/authorization gate.
